# Zombies
- Zombies are an antagonist that can infect most-all beings that they bite.
## Infection
- The three ways of getting infected are: starting out as the Intial Infected (or II) and turning into a zombie through the related action, being bitten by a zombified being, or being injected with a minimum of 5 units of [color=#a4885c]Romerol[/color] (obtainable through a [color=#a4885c]Nuclear Operatives Uplink[/color] radio).
## Objectives
- The main objective of a zombie is to infect the entire station's crew and to not die again to the crew or to the potential CBURN team.
## Cure
- If you are already zombified, the only cure, unfortunately, is death. - If you are not zombified yet, taking in 5 units of [color=#a4885c]Ambuzol[/color] will stop the infection from ensuing your timely demise, but you may still get reinfected if you're not too careful. - Alternatively, if you can stave off the infection's damage (through chemicals or a [color=#a4885c]Bible[/color]) to your body, you may be able to make it back to CentComm alive. - Taking in 5 units of [color=#a4885c]Ambuzol Plus[/color] will both stop an ongoing infection and vaccinate yourself from future infections, but only while you are alive.
